    static void
    TeamSizeLimit.check(Player pla)
    Takes the player and checks the team size (max is 4), promting the user to select one to remove one if there are to many.

    String
    Shop.buyPurchaseable(Player player, int itemIndex)
    Takes an Player object and the itemIndex that the player wishes to buy and if the player has enough gold, buys the object and adds it to the player's inventory.
